title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Cartman house, day. Cartman is watching TV and snacking on soomething. Kitty walks up

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Reowr.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, Kitty! These are my spicy-hot Louisiana-baked Chicken Tenders!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Reowr.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, Kitty!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Someday, I will collect all the Chinpoko Mon. Then I will fight the Evil Power that will reveal itself once all the Chinpoko Mon are collected-  oh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Roar?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, Kitty. You can't have these chicken tenders, because they are mine, and I keep mine to myself- oh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Be sure to tune in tomorrow for another inexplicable episode of... CHINPOKOMON.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hooray!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey kids!  Do you love Chinpokomon?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yes.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, now you can buy your very own!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to buy Chinpokomon

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: I've got to buy it, I've got to buy it! [six Chinpokomon appear]

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Now you can collect them all. Furrycat, Donkeytron, Pengin, Shoe, Lambtor. Collect them all, and you can become Royal Crown Chinpoko Master.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Whoa! Crown Chinpoko Master?! Holy shit!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: All the Chinpokomon are in stores now.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpokomon is soo-peh-rior rubbeh toy, Nuhmbah 1!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Come buy us! Chinpo-ko-mon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Mom! Mom!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The kitchen. Liane is at the sink. Cartman rushes in and runs circles around her legs

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Mom! Seriously! Let's go to the toy store, Mom. Now! Must go! Toy store!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Eric, calm down.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Uh seriously! Mom! Must go! Must buy!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What is it, Eric?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Muh. Mom, I've only just heard. They're making Chinpokomon dolls, mom. You can collect them all. You can collect them all, Mother; quick, come on. Let's go to the toy store.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I'm making you some lunch right now, Eric.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...But Mo-o-om, I have to get Chinpokomon dolls before everybody else does, 'cause then I'll be coo-oo-ool.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Can't it wait till tomorrow, hon?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...But Mo-o-om, I have to get the first one, or else people won't think I'm coo-oo-ool!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Alright! let's go.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Sweet.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The toy store, "TOYS." Cartman and Liane approach it

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Everybody's gonna be sooo jealous when they see my Chinpokomon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Give it to me!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Give it here!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, God damnit!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, fatass.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, dick-whore. I guess you saw the commercial, too.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yep. I got: Roostor, Lambtron, and Shoe.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, that's nice, but I'm gonna get a Pengin. He's the coolest.  God damnit, there's no more Pengins!  Kenny, Pengin is my favorite. That's the last one. Let me have it.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (Nuh uh.)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: C'mon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (Nuh uh!)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: C'mon, Kenny. Let me ha-

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (No!)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: C'mon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (No!)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: C'mon. Give me Pengin!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (No! This is mine!)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: C'mon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The checkout counter. Sharon is ready to pay for some Chinpokomon. Liane has one, too. Sharon turns to Liane

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Honestly, I don't see what they find so amusing about those things.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: They're so strange. Where are they from?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, it's some new big thing from Japan. I tell you, those Japanese really know how to market to kids.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to collect all Chinpokomon. I've got to collect them all so I can become Royal Crown Chinpoko Master - oooh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Own-ah Chinpokomon, and-ah you vill-ah have-ah happy feelings-eh.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I have to become Royal Crown Chinpoko Master.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Must collect Chinpokomon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: South Park, next day. The boys stand around with their Chinpokomon. Kyle is missing.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Okay, Kenny. I'll trade you my Chuchunezumi for your Pengin.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (Fuck you!)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: God damnit, you're supposed to trade those, you asshole! Now, give me Pengin!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey dudes.  What are those?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What are these? They're Chinpokomon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Huh??

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You don't appear to have any Chinpokomon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, but look: I just got this sweet Cyborg Bill doll.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oho, please. Cyborg Bill is so yesterday.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah, like ancient history.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Cyborg Bill isn't cool anymore?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, dude!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Cyborg Bill hasn't been cool for a long time, Kyle.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Why the hell don't people tell me these things?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: It's all Chinpokomon now.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Dude, if you collect Chinpokomon you can complete the Primary Main Objective.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What's the Primary Main Objective?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You don't even know what the Primary Main Objective is?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Primary Main Objective is to destroy the Evil Power.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well. what's the Evil Power?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ogh!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, my God! The identity of the Evil Power won't be revealed until all Chinpokomon are collected by a Royal Crown Chinpoko Master!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Duuuh!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Kyle, get with the times, dude!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Duuuh!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Shit!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Broflovski house. Sheila and Gerald are talking on the sofa. Ike sits to Gerald's left

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah, I guess so.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Mom, Dad, can I have money to buy Chinpokomon?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What's a Chinpokomon?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I'm not sure.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, why do you need one?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I don't know.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...Well then, the answer is no, Kyle. You just got money to buy your Cyborg Bill doll.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah, but Cyborg Bill is totally gay now. Please Mom? Everybody else has Chinpokomon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, Kyle, that's not a reason to buy something.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Neah Kyle doh.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You see, son, fads come and go. And this "Chin-po-ko Mon" is obviously nothing more than a fad. You don't have to be a part of it. In fact, you can make an even stronger statement by saying to your peers, "I'm not going to be a part of this fad, because I'm an individual." Do you understand?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yes. Yes, I do, Dad. Now let me tell you how it works in the real world. In the real world, I can either get a Chinpokomon, or I can be the only kid without one, which singles me out, and causes the other kids to make fun of me and kick my ass.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hm. Good point; here's $10.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Thanks.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Wait, here's 20. Get one for your brother, too.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, Chih-paw-ko.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The toy store. Kyle has just purchased a Lambtor

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: There you go, son. I honestly don't know what you see in these things.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Neither do I.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I guess I'll call it a night.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpoko!  Buy me! Buy me!  When will you become Royal Chinpoko Master?  Hurry up and buy me.  Down with America!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I love you. Let's be best friends, and destroy the capitalistic American government.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What the hell is goin' on here?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Cartman house, next day. The boys are engaged in a video game. Again, Kyle is absent

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey you guys! Check out my sweet Chinpokomon doll!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, please, Chinpokomon dolls are so last week.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah, dude. Don't you know? It's all about the Chinpokomon video game now. Did you bring your special Chinpokomon game controller?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Huh? No.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, you didn't get a special Chinpokomon game controller. T-heh heh heh heh. Jehesus C-hrist!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpokomon, what is Primary Objective?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: To destroy the Evil Power!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to buy all the Chinpokomon so I can destroy the Evil Power - oooh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oooh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Damnit!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to buy them all, so first I'd better go to Hawaii and visit Pearl Harbor.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Gottai to bomb thah hahbah! Deddy?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Go!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: (Hey, you guys.)

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I must buy them all! I must buy them all!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We must buy them all!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Gottai to bomb thah hahbah!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Dude! The video game gave Kenny a seizure.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Cool! This game rules!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Japan, later, Chinpokomon Company, outside. An insde shot looks to the main doors as they open, and one man walks in

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hello-o? Ey, hello?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Werucome to Chinpokomon Toy Corporashon. Purease state a-name.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Rr- Red Harris? I own a toy store in Aemrica?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Purease state the puhpose-uh.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Uh, I wanna know what the hell you people are doing with these dolls, talkin' about bringin' down American government and all?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I am President Hirohito. And-ah, this is Mr. Ose.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Peased to meet you.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We unduhstand you have big concern about our fine pro-duct.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, eh- yes. Do you mind tellin' me what the hell this is about?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The American government lies to you! Join the fight for Japanese supremacy of the world! More to come.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Uuuh.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: That is so sturange.  I do not a-know how this could happen. But urest assured, I will make sure  it does not happong again!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, now, come on, I don't think that that quite satisfies my-

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You are American?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yes.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ogh! You must have very big pee-anis!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Excuse me? I was just asking you what you're up to with these toys!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Nothing. We are very simple people. With very small penis. Mr. Ose penis is ...especially small.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Uh, smuh, so small.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We cannot achieve much with so small penis. But you! Americans. Wow! Penis so big! SOOO big penis!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well uh, he-I guess it is a pretty good size.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Minata, kite kite!  This-a man has veh-ry big penis!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Take takeru o da ne?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hai.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Uh, hoh, what an-whoa immense penis-uh!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, it certainly was nice meeting you folk, I just wanted to bring that little malfunction to your attention. Bye-bye now.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Good-bye. Thank you for stopping by, with your gargantuan penis.  Dame, dame da.  Naze kono chippu wa soto ni detandaba?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Wa, wakarimasen, sachoo san. Mondai desu nee.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Sekinin shoo yobe!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hai. Hai, sachoo san.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Cartman house, night. Kitty roars outside. Cartman is asleep, but tossing...

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to buy Chinpokomon. I've got to... buy them. Must buy Chinpokomon.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: His Chinpokomon sends up an antenna, which sends out a signal, which goes out the window and joins other signals at a point in space. Then the merged signals go to a satellite, which bounces them to Japan. The signals reach the Chinpokomon Toy Corporation's rooftop satellite dish and split up to show each Chinpokomon in its own screen on the company's video wall. President Hirohito is talking to his board of directors under heavy guard

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Amerika ni, kodomo zenbu Chinpokomon motte iru. Kore kara, "phase two" hajimete. IKIMASHOO!  The time has come! We will take Pearl Harbor!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What are you doing?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I'm watching one of Stanley's Chinpokomon video tapes.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Why?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Our son loves this show, Randy, so I think it's important that we watch it to see if it's teaching him good moral values.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, you must be Roostor! I haven't bought one of you yet, but I'll bet you can transform into Roostallion if you found Diamond Skill 7!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Roo-oo-oostor!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, I'm gonna take your Roostor and put it in this bag, where it will flourish or expire, depending on fate!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey! Is that a good idea?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Roostors aren't like Chuchunezumis. They haven't the heart for such endeavors.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oooh?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...Are those good moral values?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I don't know what the hell they're talking about.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Marsh house, later. Randy and Sharon watch a battle scene in disbelief

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Lambtron! You are losing the battle of your life!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: But Lambtron's powers also give him a good chance for a new fight. Will he succeed?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I am sad now, because Lambtron must be very lonely because there are so few Lambtrons in the world. Will he ever find a companion?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: This doesn't make sense. Are those stupid things supposed to be animals or robots or what?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I don't know, but I suddenly kinda wanna own them all.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Randy, we can't allow our son to watch this stuff!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, it's not like it's vulgar or violent.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, but it's incredibly stupid, and that could be worse on a child's mind than any vulgarity or violence. Remember what "Battle Of The Network Stars" did to an entire generation.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: My God, you're right.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: South Park, by Tom's Rhinoplasty, day. Cartman is strumming a guitar. A sign on the case reads

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Come on, brothers and sisters, we've all got to join together.

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: Join together and give me money so I can buy more Chinpokomon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: We've got to stop this fight and...

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: How's it goin', fatass?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I haven't made any money yet.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What?! You've been out here all weekend! How are we gonna raise money to get into the Chinpokomon camp?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ey! I'm the one who's been standing out here with this gay guitar like a God-damned hippie all weekend! What have you two assholes done?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We can't do anything. Kenny still hasn't come out of his seizure.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I got it! I got my Chinpokomon game controller!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Jesus Tapdancing Christ! Get with the program, Kyle!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah. Nobody plays the Chinpokomon video games anymore. Now it's all about the big weekend Chinpokomon camp.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Camp?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The makers of Chinpokomon are going town to town and putting on a special camp to show all the Chinpoko Masters how to destroy the Evil Power.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You didn't know that?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: No, uh-I knew it! I knew it. I was just testing you guys. You just wait till I get to that Chinpokomon camp! I'm gonna be the toughest master of them all! So we'll see you there, a-ight?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Dude, did you just say "a-ight"?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah. You know, like Lauren Hill. A-ight?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Oh, my God, that's so yesterday!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah, dude. Nobody says "a-ight" anymore.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What?? "A-ight"'s not cool, either?? When did that happen?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Like, eight days ago.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: God damnit!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The Marsh house, night. The TV is shown

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Hey, kids!  Only one more day till the Chinpokomon camp!  Come early and enjoy all the Chinpoko fun!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpokomon Camp!

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: I've got to buy a ticket!

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: I've got to buy one! A ticket!

title: CHINPOKOMON
role: I've got to buy buy buy!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: It'sa Satuhday anda Sunday. You can'ta wait to go!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpoko Mon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: The living room. The Broflovskis, Liane, the McCormicks, and the Tweeks join the Marshes. The TV clicks off, and Sharon speaks

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We just thought we'd bring it to everyone's attention because, honestly, we don't know how to feel.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, I'm letting Eric go to the camp. I mean, it seems to me this Chinpokomon thing is just another harmless fad.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yeah. We told Kyle he could go if he did all his chores, and he did.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Now, I'm not sure this blatant commercialism is good for our boys.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Well, you know how it is, Randy. The more we forbid them to play with Chinpokomons, the more they're gonna love them.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: You're right, Sheila. I guess the best thing we can do is just let them go until they get sick of it.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Sure. Apparently, they've been doing these camps in every city around the country; how bad can they be?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: A chinpokomon camp. A huge temple looms over the crowd of kids. Three huge screens display the Chinpokomon program. Soldiers guard the screens and the central stairway. Stan and friends move through the crowd. Several classmates are already there

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Get outta the way! Move it!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Can you see anything?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: YAY!!!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: It's starting, it's starting!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I've got to buy it! I've got to buy it! Chinpokomon!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Attention! Attention!  This isa Chinpokomon Camp!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Chinpokomon is what we strive to be great at in our hearts!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...our hearts.  Kenny?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What is the Primary Main Objective?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: To destroy the Evil Power!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: ...Power.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Yesuh. Anda what is the Evil Power? The Evil Power is the UNITED STATESUH GOVERNMENT!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ooooh.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: United Statesuh government is the Evil Power! It hasa taken Japanese Americans! It hasa broken Japanese spirit! And what do Chinpoko Masters do to Evil Power?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Destroy it!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Destroy it?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: That isa correct! Now, it isa great honor to present... your Chinpoko Leaduh! Emperor Hirohito!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Welcome to campu. Whoever passes it knows and honors that the greatness of Japan is in its history, and it is based on that history that we shall again rise to the dominant world powuh!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Is this cool or not? I can't tell.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: It is again time for the Rising Sun to sit tall in the sight! One Japan! One society!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: We will begin witha language anda exercise skills. Hajimete!!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ichi, ni, san, shi!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Ichi, ni, san, shi! Ichi, ni, san, shi!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: South Park Elementary, Mr. Garrison's class. The kids are chatting away happily in Japanese. All have anime expressions

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Okay, children, I want it quiet!  Now, we're gonna try this again until we get it right! What is 6 x 3?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Juuhachi desu ka?

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Juuhachi da nee!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: NO, GOD DAMNIT, IT'S 18!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Juuhachi is 18, Garrison-san.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: For the last time, my name is not Garrison-san, all right?! And this is not Hat-san! And you all better start talking in a manner that I can understand!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Wuu, Garrison-san sabuchii dana!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: What did he say?!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: He said, "Garrison-san sabuchii da naa!"

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Soo desu nee!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Damnit, this is not Japan!!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Minata! Kite kite, churi-

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Dare ga pu shita no.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Aaaaah!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: City Hall, the Mayor's Office. The parents are gathered in it

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: People, please! We can only speak one at a time. Now, Mr. Garrison, you were saying...

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I can't take it, Mayor. You have to put an end to this Chinpoko Camp.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: My son hasn't made any sense in days.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: I tell you, Mayor, these Japanese are trying to change our American children somehow!

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: Alright, people, Mr. Hirohito and Mr. Ose were nice emough to stop by to talk to you. Gentlemen?

title: CHINPOKOMON

text: And now, for a special annoucement from the President of the United States.

title: CHINPOKOMON
text: My fellow Americans, I wish to address the concerns many of us have over the growing number of Japanese military bases forming in the United States. The new Japanese emperor, Hirohito, has made our own children into fighter pilots who will soon fly to Hawaii and attack Pearl Harbor. I spoke with Mr. Hirohito this morning, and he assured me that I have a very large penis. He said it was mammoth, dinosauric, and absolutely dwarfed his penis, which, he assured me, was nearly microscopic in size. My penis, he said, was most likely one of the biggest on the planet. I applaud Mr. Hirohito in his honesty. Thank you.
